snippet: Doctors in Boston completed surgery on Tuesday on a broken leg that Secretary of State John Kerry suffered near Geneva on Sunday.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry undergoes surgery for broken leg in Boston, and doctors say he is expected to make full recovery.
lead_paragraph: Doctors in Boston completed surgery on Tuesday on a broken leg that Secretary of State John Kerry suffered near Geneva on Sunday.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Full Recovery Seen for Kerry After Surgery on Leg
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Full Recovery Seen for Kerry After Surgery on Leg
